#!/bin/ash
# CSS-Panel Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

apk add --update --no-cache && apk add git

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

if [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" == "true" ] || [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" == "1" ]; then
    echo -e "As you have chosen to upload your files manually. Please Re-run the installer after uploading all the files (Ignore this if already done)"
	
	echo "Installer Nodejs Version"
    node -v

    echo "Installer NPM Version"
    npm -v

    echo "Installer PNPM  Version"
    pnpm -v

    echo "Install PNPM Dependencies"
    pnpm install

    echo "PNPM Build"
    pnpm build
    exit 0
fi

echo "Pulling the CSS-Panel from github"

git clone --single-branch --branch ${BRANCH} ${GIT_ADDRESS} .

echo "Installer Nodejs Version"
node -v

echo "Installer NPM Version"
npm -v

echo "Installer PNPM  Version"
pnpm -v

echo "Install PNPM Dependencies"
pnpm install

echo "PNPM Build"
pnpm build
